message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product! After considering your potential interest, I'd like to make you an offer of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget and the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1100000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence! After re-evaluating the product's value, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm proposing a counter-counteroffer of $1150000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's worth to you.

I understand Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your flexibility. Considering my financial constraints, I would like to propose a counter-counter-counteroffer of $1125000. This amount is closer to what I am able to afford while still valuing the product highly.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence and willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm proposing a final counteroffer of $1140000. This is as close as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your efforts in adjusting your offer, Alice. I've carefully considered your proposal and would like to make one last attempt at reaching a mutually beneficial agreement. I propose a counter-counter-counter-counteroffer of $1135000. This is the highest I can go while still feeling confident about the value I'll receive from the product.
